body:
Comment 4 by **mizardx**: 
If you change the order in the multiple assignment, it still has the same problem:

    array[index], index = 0, array[index]

But if you expand it, it works as intended:

    t := array[index]
    array[index], index = 0, t

Tested with: gc release 2010-04-27 and 2010-05-27
